title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29 (Child and Family Agency) 
(Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 22 March 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29 (child family agency) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 22 march 2021

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: 2. The Child and Family Agency is designated for the purposes of section
text_raw:
2. The Child and Family Agency is designated for the purposes of section 
29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 
(No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 March, 2021. 

RODERIC O GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th March, 2021.
